I play games since 1998, when I was 4 years old. Right now I must have played more than 1000 different games easily, ranging from all titles, and I can firmly say, with all my experience in gaming, that Portal 2 is the best game of all time. No other game has this level of story, with this level of gameplay, and immersion. And for a game now considered old, it holds up pretty well in terms of graphics too.
